Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the cyclotide family (Bracelet subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism (By similarity).
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in midvein, lamina and periphery of leaves (at protein level).
Sequence Information.Domain: The presence of a 'disulfide through disulfide knot' structurally defines this protein as a knottin.

Literature.Title: Phosphate systemically inhibits development of arbuscular mycorrhiza in Petunia hybrida and represses genes involved in mycorrhizal functioning.
Literature.Author: Breuillin F, Schramm J, Hajirezaei M, Ahkami A, Favre P, Druege U, Hause B, Bucher M, Kretzschmar T, Bossolini E, Kuhlemeier C, Martinoia E, Franken P, Scholz U, Reinhardt D.

Literature.Title: Cyclotides associate with leaf vasculature and are the products of a novel precursor in petunia (Solanaceae).
Literature.Author: Poth AG, Mylne JS, Grassl J, Lyons RE, Millar AH, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ.
